item.name: 120 - Damage Level Change before Poise Break
171 - Karmic Justice - Used for Behavior Change
261 - Remove Effect If Torch In Hand
315 - Scale Attack Power with Equip Load
379 - Trigger in Presence of Blood Loss
448 - Heal Invader when Blessed Enemy Kills Player

entry.name: Behavior ID
entry.description: NPC Behavior - Requires State Info 142 Player Behavior - Requires State Info 275 Bullet Behavior - Requires State Info 334

entry.name: Effect Duration %
entry.description: Multiplier applied to the duration of the effect specified in EffectDurationMultiplierType.

entry.name: HP Recovery Effectiveness %
entry.description: Multiplier applied to any increase in character's current HP.

entry.name: Chain SpEffect ID
entry.description: Applies the SpEffect after this one has expired.

entry.name: Attack SpEffect ID
entry.description: Player - Requires State Info 153 Enemies - Requires State Info 152

entry.name: Category Priority
entry.description: Priority ordering for special effect to be applied on each update (lower values are updated first).

entry.name: Save Category
entry.description: Determines automatic game saving behavior (used for status ailments only). Set to -1 for no saving.

entry.name: Effect Duration Multiplier Type
entry.description: Type of effect whose duration is affected by Effect Duration Multiplier.

entry.name: Use Visual Effect
entry.description: Use visual effect from State Info Visuals table

entry.name: Use Intelligence Scaling
entry.description: Scales certain fields based on spell buff derived from current INT.

entry.name: Use Faith Scaling
entry.description: Scales certain fields based on spell buff derived from current FTH.

entry.name: Enable in NG+
entry.description: Enables the SpEffect if in NG+

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Void
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Void.

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Undead
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Undead.

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Ancient Draconic
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Ancient Draconic.

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Draconic
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Draconic.
